    API endpoints for blockchain data. This category currently includes 1 endpoint:

    • /v1/blockchain/statistics/latest - Latest statistics
    Author:

    • Method Detail

      • getStatisticsLatest

        @GetMapping(path="statistics/latest",
            produces="application/json")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> getStatisticsLatest(@RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                                                                                                                      java.lang.String id,
                                                                                                                                                                      @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                                                                                                                      java.lang.String symbol,
                                                                                                                                                                      @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                                                                                                                      java.lang.String slug)

        Returns the latest blockchain statistics data for 1 or more blockchains. Bitcoin, Litecoin, and Ethereum are currently supported. Additional blockchains will be made available on a regular basis.

        This endpoint is available on the following API plans:

        • Enterprise

        Cache / Update frequency: Every 15 seconds.

        Plan credit use: 1 call credit per request.

        Parameters:
        id - One or more comma-separated cryptocurrency CoinMarketCap IDs to return blockchain data for. Pass 1,2,1027 to request all currently supported blockchains.
        symbol - Alternatively pass one or more comma-separated cryptocurrency symbols. Pass BTC,LTC,ETH to request all currently supported blockchains.
        slug - Alternatively pass a comma-separated list of cryptocurrency slugs. Pass bitcoin,litecoin,ethereum to request all currently supported blockchains.
        Returns:
        Latest blockchain statistics data for 1 or more blockchains.
